actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to inform the President of the United States of the election of Speaker and Clerk of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Informs the President that the House of Representatives has elected the Honorable Jim Wright, of Texas, as Speaker, and Donnald K. Anderson as Clerk for the 100th Congress.

titles.title: A resolution to inform the President of the United States of the election of Speaker and Clerk of the House of Representatives.
